flavor_text_entries.x:
From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
flavor_text_entries.y:
The hotter the flame sac on its belly,
the faster it can fly, but it takes some
time to get the fire going.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
From its beak, it expels embers that set
the tall grass on fire. Then it pounces on
the bewildered prey that pop out of the grass.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
The hotter the flame sac on its belly,
the faster it can fly, but it takes some
time to get the fire going.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
From its beak, it fires embers at its prey. Once
it has caught them, it grills them at high heat
before feasting upon them.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
It will not tolerate other Fletchinder entering its
territory, which has a radius of several miles.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It scatters embers in the tall grass. Then bug
Pokémon, frightened by the flames, come
flying out, and Fletchinder gobbles them up.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Its speed right after takeoff already puts it in
the top speed class of all bird Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Fletchinder launches embers into the den of
its prey. When the prey comes leaping out,
Fletchinder’s sharp talons finish it off.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Fletchinder are exceedingly territorial and
aggressive. These Pokémon fight among
themselves over feeding grounds.
